avisLegalp1: This website and its content are owned by Àgora de Ciència.
avisLegalp2: Please read this legal notice carefully before using the website.
avisLegalp3: Access to and use of this website is subject to the following conditions:
avisLegalli1: The content of the pages of this website is for your general information and use only. It is subject to change without notice.
avisLegalli2: The use of any information or materials on this website is at your own risk, and we shall not be liable. It is your responsibility to ensure that any product, service, or information available through this website meets your specific requirements.
avisLegalli3: This website contains material which is owned by us or licensed to us. This material includes, but is not limited to, the design, layout, look, appearance, and graphics. Reproduction is prohibited except in accordance with the copyright notice, which forms part of these terms and conditions.
avisLegalli4: All trademarks reproduced on this website which are not the property of Àgora de Ciència or licensed to Àgora de Ciència are acknowledged on the website.
avisLegalli5: Unauthorized use of this website may give rise to a claim for damages and/or be a criminal offense.
privacitatp1: This Privacy Policy describes how Àgora de Ciència collects, uses, and protects the information you provide when using this website.
privacitatp2: We may collect the following information:
privacitatli3: Other information relevant to our activities development.
privacitatp3: We use this information to provide users with information about our association's activities and to process memberships. User data may be transmitted to third parties only when necessary to provide association services, such as organizing activities by third parties.
privacitatp4: The data subject has the right to:
privacitatli7: Object to the total or partial processing of their data.
privacitatli8: Limit the use of their data.
privacitatp5: You can exercise your rights or file any complaints by sending an email to agoradeciencia@gmail.com.
presentacioCos: Àgora de Ciència was born as an initiative for scientific outreach to bring science to all the people in the town of Picanya. This association believes in the right of citizens to have access to accurate and verified information regarding scientific issues that affect us as a community, and they want the people of the town to change their perception of science to a more realistic one: that of a human activity, with its history, successes, mistakes, interactions, and biases. And above all, Àgora de Ciència wants to awaken, among the public, curiosity and interest in science.
